channel.title: Is there a better way to write this?

item.title: Is there a better way to write this?
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

Ok so I am writing a tutorial island base for my Pi and I am at the chef, (Note this is a base it isntâ€¦ to fantastic) and Iwas wondering if there were a better way for me to do the bread instead of this:

if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2307,1)) { c.startAnimation(883); c.getItems().deleteItem(2307, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2309, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(500 * Config.COOKING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerCooking); }

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a better way to write this?
